description: Leading engineering teams at Heady—streamlining operations, mentoring talent, and driving agile, data-driven excellence in software development and customer satisfaction.
Built innovative mobile apps from design to deployment, leading an iOS team to streamline testing, enhance UIs, and boost user retention in education.
Engaged with clients to turn their needs into actionable plans, collaborated on app solutions, and bridged communication for continuous improvement.
Collaborated with teams to build core features for seamless UX and robust performance, prototyped and rigorously tested new features, and kept managers updated while adapting to emerging tech.
